title: A response to the Critical Summary presentation
post: I am one of those who believe that the Shroud of Turin is the actual burial cloth of Jesus Christ.  I have given my reasons before on one of these Shroud sites.
author: Emmett McMahon

title: A response to the Critical Summary presentation
post: You are far from alone, and there is reasonable evidence for your belief. I, on the other hand, am not able to accept the authenticity of the Shroud. I too, am far from alone, and there is reasonable evidence for my belief. One day, perhaps, sufficient strength of evidence will be accumulated to change one of our minds. I do hope it will be mine that changes!

author: Paulette

title: A response to the Critical Summary presentation
post: Paulette, I disagree. It doesn’t matter where a paper is stored as long as it is accessible. I don’t see anything wrong in this regard. This is common. The links work and the search engines take care of the rest.

title: A response to the Critical Summary presentation
post: I agree with you on this point, Dan.  As long as it is accessible on the web, why would anyone complain?
